version_description: * Issue with field placement is now fixed
* Issue with field placement is now fixed

- Manual field placement
- Cancel Run option
- Batsman celebration when he reaches 50 runs or 100 runs
- Fireworks for winning the match in FCL & WPL
- Data representation

- Manual field placement
- Cancel Run option
- Batsman celebration when he reaches 50 runs or 100 runs
- Fireworks for winning the match in FCL & WPL
- Data representation

- Facebook friends list issue got fixed
- Performance enhancement in User Interface
- Minor bug fixes

- Facebook friends list issue got fixed
- Performance enhancement in User Interface
- Minor bug fixes

- No Ball & Free Hit
- Stumping
- Third Umpire decision
- New animations along with cinematic camera movements
- New commentaries
- Now you can send challenges to your Facebook Friends even if you signed-in with custom login
- Enhanced game-play GRAPHICS
- Stable and optimized game-play
- Minor bug fixes

- No Ball & Free Hit
- Stumping
- Third Umpire decision
- New animations along with cinematic camera movements
- New commentaries
- Now you can send challenges to your Facebook Friends even if you signed-in with custom login
- Enhanced game-play GRAPHICS
- Stable and optimized game-play
- Minor bug fixes

MAJOR UPDATE
- Unlock additional Overs & Tournament modes - The long wait is over!
- Share/request points with friends
- Gangs of Cricket - Form a gang & complete the challenges to earn more points!
- Missions - Level up yourself!
- Shout Board
- Hall Of Fame/Shame achievements!
- Online cloud sync of your points, statistics, Hall of Fame/Shame etc.,
- Now you can send/accept 5 Overs challenges!
- Email validation will give you bonus points!
- And minor bug fixes
Note : Some of the features are 2015 Beta release
